alert.note: Alert for Elkhart; St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 8:16PM EST until February 03 at 1:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Michigan...Indiana... Saint Joseph River Michigan at South Bend affecting St. Joseph, Berrien and Elkhart Counties. Saint Joseph River Michigan at Three Rivers affecting Branch, Elkhart and St. Joseph MI Counties. .Recent snow melt and rainfall will lead to additional rises on area rivers. For the Saint Joseph River Michigan...including Three Rivers, Mottville, Elkhart IN, South Bend, Niles...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saint Joseph River Michigan at South Bend. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 5.5 feet, The river reaches flood stage with the lowest residential areas beginning to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM EST Sunday the stage was 5.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Tuesday morning to a crest of 5.6 feet Tuesday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 5.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. The next statement will be issued Monday afternoon at 230 PM EST.
